title: Virtual Learning Object Design for Nursing History Education: ADDIE Model-Based Online Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and understanding of healthcare systems
context.additional_context: Blended Classes (Synchronous/Asynchronous Activities) Based on the MOODLE Platform, Utilizing Personal Devices for Learning Environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain key events and figures in nursing history in chronological order.
Learners can analyze the impact of historical nursing cases on modern nursing practice on a case-by-case basis.
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning strategies using virtual learning objects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
